scenario_text.value: Look! There’s Syakomon!
Ah, Miu! I’m so happy to see you safe!
Syakomon... You look like the real one.

You okay? You’re not hurt or anything, are
you?

I’m fine! I’ve got my spirit power, after all.
If an enemy shows up, I can just exorcise it!
Heheh, oh, Miu...

You can’t do anything like that, right?
You’re just a normal, silly little girl.
No way...

It’s impossible to lie about yourself. You’ll
be found out eventually.

Actually, I bet they’ve already figured you
out. Just give up and act like a normal girl.

But, but I don’t want that... I mean, if
I don’t do this, I’ll be all on my own.

But you’re already a loner. Not a single
person gives a damn about you.

Oh, I guess that’s not totally true. Some
people are crazy interested in you.

There’s your brother. Then there’s that guy
who—
Stop it already!

No, no! I don’t want to remember! Don’t say
things to make me remember!
It’s okay, Miu. You know you’re not alone.
*sniff* Urrrgh... Takumaaa...

Miu has more than just Kaito. She has me and
the rest of us.

Then there’s Agumon, of course. And more than
anything, she’s got Syakomon.

And the real Syakomon would never call Miu
something like a loner.
Yeah... Yeah, you’re totally right.
Hmph...
Ah, she disappeared!
Come on, let’s keep going.
Okay!
